name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: First Base: The Packaged App Boilerplate

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're looking to get started quickly building a packaged application for Google Chrome or for Chrome OS, just clone thisâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're looking to get started quickly building a packaged application for Google Chrome or for Chrome OS, just clone this application and start editing right away.

The source can be found at https://github.com/figital/first-base
